item.title: In-Depth Guide to Variable Handling and Runtime Mechanics
item.description: How a Program Knows the Location of Variables? Symbol Table (Compiler’s Map) The compiler creates a symbol table during the compilation phase.

item.title: How Declarative UI is Reshaping the Developer's Workflow
item.description: The other day, nostalgia hit me hard. I found myself diving back into Android development after what felt like ages.
